fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: AILO Secretariat Level 21, Bastion Tower 5, Place de Champ de Mars
eu_initiatives: Regulations and Directives aimed at Financial Services, cross border activities and distribution such as Solvency II, PRIIPS, IDD, PEPPs ...
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: To represent life assurance companies who only operate cross border within the EEA to their Regulator, NCAs, MEPs and persons who work for the Commission and Council.
